org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.compat

Class BackwardsCompatibleThreePhaseCommitCohort

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.common.actor.AbstractUntypedActor
        • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.compat.BackwardsCompatibleThreePhaseCommitCohort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class BackwardsCompatibleThreePhaseCommitCohort
extends AbstractUntypedActor
    An actor to maintain backwards compatibility for the base Helium version where the 3-phase commit messages don't contain the transactionId. This actor just forwards a new message containing the transactionId to the parent Shard.
    Author:
    Thomas Pantelis
